creator: znbasheerahmed@statestreet.com
text:
When I run the ./configure --prefix=<<DIR>> 

The last message that is thrown in the console is 

"checking whether to enable mod_rewrite... no"

In the config.log file the follwing error is logged.

"Cannot read data from license server (-16,15:22) Invalid argument"

Please suggest what could be the reason for the error

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: Some piece of your compiler is configured to talk to a license server and it can't contact it.  Not an Apache issue.
